name: petstoreapinodejs
description: This is API tests for petstore
author: Amjad Ali

scripts.test: mocha ./spec/**/*.spec.js -- --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=./mochawesome-report,reportFilename=petstore-api-report,reportTitle="PetStore API Test Report",reportPageTitle="PetStore API Tests",autoOpen=true,code=false
